mcq.statement: Choose the correct punctuation: History it has been said is the essence of innumerable biographies.

options.a: History, it has been said is the essence of innumerable biographies.
options.b: History , it has been said, is the essence of innumerable biographies.
options.c: History it has been said, is the essence of innumerable biographies.
options.d: History, it has been said is the essence of innumerable, biographies.
